bill.title: Locksmiths; provide for licensing of.
bill.description: An Act To License And Regulate Locksmiths; To Define Certain Terms; To Create The Mississippi Locksmith Licensing Board And Prescribe Its Duties And Powers; To Provide License Qualifications; To Require The Payment Of Licensing And Examination Fees; To Require Photo Identification; To Require The Posting Of Licenses And Specify Responsibilities Of Licensees; To Provide For Disciplinary Procedures; To Provide Exemptions; To Authorize The Board To Seek Injunctions; To Allow Certain Locksmiths To Be Licensed Without Examination For A Limited Time; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Workforce Development;Ways and Means
